attributes.action: Help first time buyers to get onto the property ladder!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 24 years old and my partner is 28 years old. We are both working full time and are on much more than the minimum wage, but yet we cannot afford to get a mortgage to buy a house of our own. Even if we could get someone to give us a mortgage, the house prices are still too high! It is not enough to give us 'shared ownership' schemes, whereby you must pay half the mortgage and half as rent to the other owner. With rising prices everywhere else in Britain today this is not the answer. First time buyers need a chance to get onto the property ladder NOW, before rental prices start to rise...
